content: How do I fix the security tagging vocabulary? http://build.fhir.org/security-labels.html#hcs
The valueset pages give "404 not found", and downloading the HCS needs login to the HL7 site.
yes, I understand.... I am a core FHIR owner, asking the terminology gods where they have moved my valuesets...

Probably moved to https://terminology.hl7.org
Is this one of them?
https://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet-v3-ActInformationSensitivityPolicy.html
I figure that is the problem.. but I was told those changes were done already... so I figure this must be one forgotten.

@Grahame Grieve was this simply accidently missed because of the html way it is referenced? I think the places where a valueSet was used in the spec it worked out to http://hl7.org/fhir/R4/valueset-security-labels.html
this is yet another UTG related to do for me
so @Grahame Grieve do you got this one? Do you need a jira ticket for it?
I got it. and no, I won't need a ticket
